This is the course website for the [EMSE](https://www.emse.seas.gwu.edu/) graduate course "Marketing Analytics for Design Decisions" at the [George Washington University](https://www.gwu.edu/). The course teaches analytical tools to inform design decisions in an uncertain, competitive market; topics include consumer choice modeling, programming in the [R programming language](https://www.r-project.org/), survey design, conjoint analysis, optimization, market simulation, and professional communication skills.
